selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: To calculate the sum of the identified digits.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to compute the sum of the digits '5' and '3'.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: To format the final answer for output.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the sum result as a single line answer.

new_skill_specs.name: identify_digits_on_sign
new_skill_specs.purpose: To identify and extract digits located on either end of a sign in an image.
edge_cases: Image does not contain a sign
Sign does not have digits on either end
